rules_text: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just X cards beneath the top, where X is the number of creatures you control that dealt combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn.
flavor_text: [i]For all his bluster, As'hin had no experience with a fair fight; Luningning's team tore through all he had before he even knew he was losing.[/i]
notes:
(If no creatures attacked or blocked, its owner puts it on top of their library.)
!Samang !Ashan
